content: the miss eleanor socks are worked from the cuff down to the toes with a short-row heel the stitch pattern is easily memorized and is pleasant to knit you can follow either the written instructions or the chart on page 2 ======================================== **materials** **biscotte yarns** | bis-sock 1 skein shown in self-striping color lichen as the original colour featured in beach day for the 2025 version **circular or dpn needles** of 2 5 mm us #1 5 cable length of 80 cm 32 in or size needed to obtain gauge **1 tapestry needle ** **gauge** 32 sts = 10 cm in stockinette stitch **leg circumference** 16 5 cm 6 5 in 18 cm 7 in unstretched **foot length** is adjustable la version française du patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/bas-miss-eleanor-patron-de-tricot
